title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Capacity Building for Sustainable Electrochemistry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry and physics concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explaining fundamental principles of electrochemistry (electrodes, electrolytes, oxidation-reduction reactions, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Designing and executing at least three electrochemistry experiment procedures using the Lectrofun 2.0 lab kit
Developing an electrochemistry experiment module considering eco-friendly materials and recyclable resources, and proposing implementation strategies for educational settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
